vital_signs.oxygen_saturation: 96% (at rest), 95% (after climbing one flight of stairs)

relevant_findings.lung_auscultation: Bilateral crackles at end inspiration, most prominent over the right lung base.
relevant_findings.associated_symptoms: Ongoing dyspnea provoked by exertion and occasional cough productive of scant greenish-brown mucus.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Impairment noted in diffusion capacity indicative of a restrictive ventilatory deficit.

relevant_findings.CT_scan: Persistent subpleural reticular opacities, new bilateral traction bronchiolectasis, dilatation of main pulmonary artery (33 mm), new enlargement of mediastinal lymph nodes.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening pulmonary findings with the development of new traction bronchiolectasis.

relevant_findings.CT_scan: Progression of bilateral subpleural reticular opacities and traction bronchiectasis, without honeycombing.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression noted in subpleural reticular opacities and traction bronchiectasis.
